long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Etsy Reviews Extractor - your ultimate tool for effortlessly extracting and analyzing reviews from Etsy products. This user-friendly browser extension allows you to quickly gather reviews and export them in CSV, JSON, or XLSX (Excel) formats, making data organization and analysis a breeze. With the added AI Review Summary feature, you can gain deeper insights into customer feedback, including "Advantages," "Disadvantages," "Improvement," and "To Buy Or Not To Buy" recommendations.

Key Features
- Effortless Data Extraction: Extract reviews for any Etsy product with just one click. No more tedious copying and pasting.
- Multiple Export Formats: Export your data in CSV, JSON, or XLSX (Excel) formats for easy use in Excel or other data analysis tools.
- Comprehensive Data Scraping: Gather detailed information including User Name, User Avatar, User Profile, Rating, Description, Image, Posted Date, Purchased Item, Purchased Item Link, and Scraped Time.
- AI Review Summary: Utilize AI to summarize reviews, providing insights into product advantages, disadvantages, areas for improvement, and purchase recommendations.

How It Works
1. Open a Product Page: Navigate to any product on the Etsy.com website.
2. Start Scraping: Click the "Download Reviews" button next to the reviews count to begin scraping.
3. Download Data: Once the process is complete, click "Download Reviews" in the popup to save the data in your preferred format (CSV, JSON, or XLSX).
4. AI Analysis (Optional): Click the “AI Review Summary” button for an in-depth analysis of the reviews.

Speed and Efficiency
The data extraction process begins immediately after your request, with the duration varying based on the volume of information. This ensures you receive your results as quickly as possible.

Data Privacy
Your data remains secure and confined to your local machine, ensuring complete privacy and control over your information.

Disclaimer 
This extension is an independently developed product by ExtensionsBox and has no association with Etsy.
